snippet: Economic conditions have many workers worried that their company retirement plans will not provide enough income, but top executives could actually benefit from those conditions.
abstract: Economic conditions have many workers worried that their company retirement plans will not provide enough income, but top executives could actually benefit from those conditions and trends that are causing traditional pensions to disappear, uncertainty with tax rates and with the future of Social Security.
